This was on my wishlist for about a month because I couldn’t justify the price. As you can see, I eventually said eff it and bought it. I have had it for a month now and I LOVE this bag! The material is durable, the color of the bag matches all of my other black clothes for the most part and the strap that comes with it is nice quality too. You can use it as a messenger bag or as a shoulder bag depending on your vibe. I do wish it had better zipper placement but it isn’t the worst. I love all the separate pockets on the outside and inside of the bag since I carry a lot during the day. It’s a bag that’s big enough to carry school supplies, it can be used as a small overnight bag or even a diaper bag. I use it for my work and school materials so it’s always full and I’ve never had an issue with anything breaking off or becoming worn too fast. Definitely worth the money!

The bag feels nice quality and has nice hardware and is very comfortable to carry and/wear. the bag comes with convertible straps which allow it to become a cross body or shoulder bag. there are a lot of tiny details that are so cute about this bag! the handcuff actually can come completely uncuffed, and cuffed back, there is a small skull charm with red rhinestones eyes, and the hardware around the bag feels nice quality and strong. the only issue i have is that the grommet belt detail around the entirety of the bag can sometimes come undone, but it’s a VERY simple fix. i bought this bag to carry my school supplies and as an art student, it can easily carry my ipad, sketch books, folders, brushes, pencil cases, etc. and still have so much space for things like a makeup touch up pouch, chargers, headphones and your phone! you name it, it probably will fit!! genuinely an amazing bag and definitely worth the money!

I just got the bag today so I can’t say much on durability. I can still tell that right out of the bag, it’s super sturdy. The only way I can think to describe the space inside is that it could hold two or three textbooks to be  completely full. Even then, you’d still have some space to keep little things like your wallet and make-up from the crazy amount of pockets this thing has. It’s good for travel, fits well beneath an airplane seat. Has three straps, two to make it a shoulder bag and one long one for a crossbody bag.

评论概述: A bag with style and room for everything and more
评论详情: This is the fourth bag I have ordered from Lost Queen. I have not been disappointed by any of them. This bag in particular looks just like the pictures and is so adorable in person. One thing that I don't feel gets translated with the pictures is just how big this purse is. It almost feels like the size of a diaper bag and not a purse. And there are pockets for days so if you like pockets this is definitely the bag for you. There are some drawbacks to this particular purse in general however. The zippers are very hard to manipulate and the extra decorations on the purse don't stay on well. Aside from that though everything is awesome on the bag and I am thoroughly happy with my purchase. I will most definitely end up with more lost Queen purses in my collection. They last a long time and are durable, I just am excessively hard on my bags and like switching up my style. Bonus for any weird cat owners- my cat loves sleeping in this thing it's so big 😹

评论详情: Love love love this purse!  The zippers are not the greatest, definitely sticky, but I am not too bothered by that. All of the hardware is cute and seems well made.  Even had little false jewels in the skull eyes which i just loved!  I am very happy with this bag

didn’t recieve any of the hardware for it. no grommet strap around the loops, no handcuff skull charm. just keep in mind you might have to buy a belt and chain for it, but it should still come with what says included, for the price quality control should be in mind. i shouldn’t have to buy a grommet belt to strap around it and get a handcuff chain.

I know they give the dimensions in the ad but my brain didn't comprehend them apparently, however that being said I actually use every bit of space. With having 3 kids this is actually an ideal bag because I can carry my stuff and then some. I love that it has the adjustable shoulder strap as well as the smaller handles. It's very good quality compared to purses I've owned in the past...which has been numerous lol. Very happy with my purchase.

Update: 2 1/2 years later, still a perfect bag!  This one has been pretty much my daily since I got it in 2022. Occasionally I switch it out but I'm general it has been in constant use since I got it and it is still going strong. It's been washed, kicked when I've sat it on the floor, knocked around when the kids throw their backpacks on it, I don't abuse it, but it takes some rough handling. And I still get tons of compliments on it.  None of the stitching has come loose. The handles are still holding strong. No tears, no signs of wear.  The charms on the zippers did disappear quite quickly, and after taking the "belt" part off to wash it, it never went back on correctly.  However, only one of the side pocket zippers has gotten messed up and pulled apart. The rest are fine. I don't use those pockets though, so that might explain why.  Over all, it's still a great purse. I use it more often than not, so I can attest to it being sturdy. Unless you're really battering it and carrying around really heavy stuff (I mean really heavy), it's going to last.  Original review: First, I get a ton of compliments on it. And it's so perfectly goth. It's hard to find a large bag that's still gothy.  Warning though, because of the construction, it's a heavy bag without anything in it (which I don't mind at all. I'm used to carrying heavy things).  The color is beautiful, the hardware is great, and the materials are sturdy. It is not a flimsy faux leather, it's thick cotton for the body, and the straps are very sturdy.  Other reviewers had issues with the zippers. I pulled the zippers open, not with the pull, but just opened them, and every zipper has zipped perfectly. Now, granted some are hard to reach, but I figured that by looking at the pictures.  It's roomy. Very, very, roomy. Lose a small child in there roomy. However, I use a purse organizer (best invention ever) so I never have to dig through the purse for my keys or wallet. It's the perfect size for my organizer AND has extra room so I can have the shoulder strap in there (just in case I want to carry it that way) and carry a couple small cotton shopping bags.  I think that it will be a bag that lasts. The materials are high quality and the construction is sturdy. For the price, you are getting a large, quality bag. They could charge more for it and it would still be worth it! (Don't though! I want the red stripe and the back and white stripe too.. at the current price!)
